DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multi-center , observational study assess progression-free survival safety patient locally advanced metastatic non-small cell lung cancer treat Tarceva ( erlotinib ) disease progress least 9 month . Data collect 24 month .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Tarceva ( Erlotinib ) Patients With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /=18 year age Diagnosis locally advance metastatic nonsmall cell lung cancer ( NSCLC , stage III/IV ) Treatment Tarceva monotherapy progress least 9 month date study start Not agree followedup ( maximum 24 month )
